params.ids: The array of token ids of the asset to transfer.
params.values: The amount of each token to transfer.

params._options: The options that configure how the fees are settled.

params._config: The configuration of the Hyperdrive pool.

getPoolConfig().details: These parameters are immutable, so this should only need to be      called once.

returns._0: Governance fees denominated in shares yet to be collected.

params._slots: The storage slots the caller wants the data from.

returns._0: A raw array of loaded data.

params._status: True to pause all deposits and false to unpause them.

params.amount: The max tokens the approved person can use, setting to        uint256.max will cause the value to never decrement [saving gas        on transfer].
params.operator: The address who will be able to use the tokens.
params.tokenID: The asset to approve the use of.

params.amount: The max tokens the approved person can use, setting to        uint256.max will cause the value to never decrement [saving gas        on transfer].
params.caller: The eth address which called the linking contract.
params.operator: The address who will be able to use the tokens.
params.tokenID: The asset to approve the use of.

params.approved: True to approve, false to remove approval.
params.operator: The eth address which can access the caller's assets.

params.amount: The amount of token to move.
params.from: The address who's balance will be reduced.
params.to: The address who's balance will be increased.

params.amount: The amount of token to move.
params.from: The address who's balance will be reduced.
params.to: The address who's balance will be increased.

balanceOf(uint256,address).notice: Gets an account's balance of a sub-token.

batchTransferFrom(address,address,uint25.notice: Transfers several assets from one account to another.

collectGovernanceFee((address,bool,bytes.notice: This function collects the governance fees accrued by the pool.

getPoolInfo().notice: Gets info about the pool's reserves and other state that is         important to evaluate potential trades.

getUncollectedGovernanceFees().notice: Gets info about the fees presently accrued by the pool.

getWithdrawPool().notice: Gets information about the withdrawal pool.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Gets the approval status of an operator for an account.

load(uint256[]).notice: Allows plugin data libs to provide getters or other complex         logic instead of the main.

name(uint256).notice: Gets the name of a sub-token.

nonces(address).notice: Gets the permitForAll signature nonce for an account.

pause(bool).notice: Allows an authorized address to pause this contract.

perTokenApprovals(uint256,address,addres.notice: Gets the approval status of an operator for an account.

setApproval(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Allows a user to set an approval for an individual asset with         specific amount.

setApprovalBridge(uint256,address,uint25.notice: Allows the compatibility linking contract to forward calls to         set asset approvals.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Allows a user to approve an operator to use all of their assets.

setPauser(address,bool).notice: Allows governance to change the pauser status of an address.

symbol(uint256).notice: Gets the symbol of a sub-token.

totalSupply(uint256).notice: Gets the total supply of a sub-token.

transferFrom(uint256,address,address,uin.notice: Transfers an amount of assets from the source to the destination.

transferFromBridge(uint256,address,addre.notice: Permissioned transfer for the bridge to access, only callable by         the ERC20 linking bridge.

documentation.text:
@notice Instantiates target0.
 @param _config The configuration of the Hyperdrive pool.

@notice Allows an authorized address to pause this contract.
 @param _status True to pause all deposits and false to unpause them.

@notice Allows governance to change governance.
 @param _who The new governance address.

@notice Gets the base token.
 @return The base token.

@notice Gets information about the withdrawal pool.
 @return Hyperdrive's withdrawal pool information.

@notice Gets info about the fees presently accrued by the pool.
 @return Governance fees denominated in shares yet to be collected.

@notice Gets the market state.
 @return The market state.
